Package simmasto0

Class C_Landscape

  • java.lang.Object
    • simmasto0.C_Landscape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_ConstantString
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    C_LandscapeNetwork
    public class C_Landscape
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_ConstantString
    The global container of a given protocol.
    1/ Owns a grid/matrix with values ('affinity'), landplots of cells with the same affinity values.
    Values are read from a file. It can be an ASCII text grid or an image raster. (the image must be in grey levels or in 256 or less colors). affinity values are stored in a gridValueLayer (as well as in the cell container attributes)
    2/ Owns a continuous space
    Author:
    Baduel 2009.04, Le Fur 2009.12, Longueville 2011.02, Le Fur 02.2011, 07.2012, 04.2015
    rev. JLF 10.2015, 11.2015 - was formerly C_Raster
    TODO JLF 2020.04 Should be normally in ground package
    See Also:
    A_Protocol

        Parameters:
        parent - the parents agent
        child - the new agent it's sex can be provided by its type.
        Author Jean-Emmanuel Longueville 2011-01

      • findObjectsOncontinuousSpace

        public java.util.TreeSet<I_SituatedThing> findObjectsOncontinuousSpace​(I_SituatedThing thing,
                                                                       double radius_Umeter)
        Provide list of all perceptible things in a radius of vision_Umeter (except this).
        This method deals with gridcells (i.e., C_SoilCell); we convert the vision of the agent from a vision in meter to a vision in cells then we obtain the field agent associated to the concerned cells. We then keep only those within their perception radius
        Parameters:
        thing - : I_situated_thing
        radius_Umeter - the perception sphere of agent
        Returns:
        list of situated things

      • bordure

        private void bordure​(A_Animal animalLeavingLandscape)
        Results in the exit of an agent and the entry of a new one in a random point at the edges of the simulation space. author Longueville 2011, rev. JLF 11.2015
        Parameters:
        animalLeavingLandscape - will be removed and a new one of the same class will enter

      • identifyAffinityLandPlots

        public java.util.TreeSet<C_LandPlot> identifyAffinityLandPlots​(repast.simphony.context.Context<java.lang.Object> context)
        Scan all SoilCells and allocate them to a given landPlot, create a new one each time it changes.
        This method doesn't update old landPlots but it builds new ones. And old ones remain in the context.
        If necessary, it is possible to "update" the old see (C_RasterGraphManager.identifyTypeLandPlots()).
        25/09/2013
        Parameters:
        context -
        See Also:
        C_LandscapeNetwork.identifyTypeLandPlots(java.lang.String)
